data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Kemper, Jenny M., Ebert, David A., Compagno, Leonard J. V., Didier, Dominique A. (2010): Chimaera notafricana sp. nov. (Chondrichthyes: Chimaeriformes: Chimaeridae), a new species of chimaera from southern Africa. Zootaxa 2532: 55-63, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.293361
